tasks.label: 🚀 Start MCP Multi-Core Server
tasks.detail: Start enhanced MCP multi-core server with GPU acceleration

tasks.label: ⚡ MCP Metrics Dashboard
args: Write-Host '📊 MCP Server Metrics Dashboard' -ForegroundColor Cyan; $health = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'http://localhost:3000/mcp/health'; $metrics = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'http://localhost:3000/mcp/metrics'; $workers = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'http://localhost:3000/mcp/workers'; Write-Host "✅ Status: $($health.status)" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host "👥 Workers: $($workers.active)/$($workers.total)" -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host "🖥️ Memory: $([math]::Round($metrics.memory.heapUsed / 1MB, 2)) MB" -ForegroundColor Magenta; Write-Host "⏱️ Uptime: $([math]::Round($health.uptime, 2))s" -ForegroundColor Cyan

tasks.label: 🔄 Restart MCP Server
args: Write-Host '🔄 Restarting MCP Server...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; taskkill /F /IM node.exe /FI "WINDOWTITLE eq *mcp-multicore*" 2>$null; Start-Sleep 2; Write-Host '✅ Starting fresh MCP instance...' -ForegroundColor Green
